sourcesContent: import React from "react" import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css" import { MapContainer, Popup, Marker,TileLayer } from 'react-leaflet' import { Icon } from "leaflet" import { useMap } from 'react-leaflet/hooks' const costumIcon = new Icon({ iconUrl:require("./img/icono.png") ,iconSize:[90.90] }) const MapView = ({ip ,lat,lon}) => { var position = [lat,lon] return( <> hola como va ) } export default MapView
